uk.ac.uea.framework.implementation

Class SoundResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.uea.framework.implementation.SoundResource

  • public class SoundResource
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to load, play or stop a sound resource by providing a way to handle the external sound resource in a generic manner.

      SoundResource(Activity Act)
      Constructor

    • Constructor Detail

      • SoundResource

        public SoundResource(Activity Act)
        Constructor

        Allows for the instantiation of a SoundResource object Instantiates the MyAudio member variable by instantiating the AndroidAudio class which implements the Audio interface.

        Parameters:
        Act - : parameter of type Activity; used to instantiate the MyAudio variable

    • Method Detail

      • load

        public void load(java.lang.String resourcePath)
        Loads a sound file located in the resource path given. As standard Android Studio looks for a file in the assets folder of the project.
        Parameters:
        resourcePath - : the path where the audio file is saved

      • play

        public void play()
        Plays a sound

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Stops a sound
